Package digit_recognizer

Class Recognizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • digit_recognizer.Recognizer
  • public class Recognizer
extends java.lang.Object

    Main recognizer class.

    Class contains all necessary methods to recognize the MNIST images.

    Since:
    04.07.2022
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Orest Maiatskyi

    • Field Detail

      • k

        private int k
        The number of neighbors.

        Also known as the coefficient k.

        See Also:
        What is the k-nearest neighbors algorithm?

      • metricType

        private MetricTypes metricType
        The type of metric to use.

        The selected metric will be responsible for the discrepancy in the color of the pixels in the image.
        Metric types: MetricTypes.

      • trainMatrices

        private MnistMatrix[] trainMatrices
        Array of mnist images in grayscale value set format.

        The MnistMatrix is used to conveniently store images in this format.
        MnistMatrix: MnistMatrix.

    • Method Detail

      • findMajority

        private int findMajority​(MnistMatrix[] suitableMatrix)
        Returns the value of majority of the same MnistMatrix.
        Parameters:
        suitableMatrix - the simple array that contains first k MnistMatrix.
        Returns:
        MnistMatrix.

      • predict

        private int predict​(MnistMatrix matrixToBeRecognized)
        Returns the recognized digit.
        Parameters:
        matrixToBeRecognized - a simple MnistMatrix that needs to be recognized.
        Returns:
        recognized digit.

      • recognize

        public int recognize​(MnistMatrix matrixToBeRecognized)
        Returns the same value as predict(MnistMatrix).

        A simple wrapper of predict(utils.mnist_data_io.MnistMatrix) method.

        Parameters:
        matrixToBeRecognized - a simple MnistMatrix that needs to be recognized.
        Returns:
        recognized digit.

      • checkErrorRate

        public void checkErrorRate​(MnistMatrix[] testMatrices,
                           int numberOfThreads)
        Print in console error rate.

        This method used for detection error rate of recognition. This method creates instances of StreamingRecognition class to be able to use multithreading, after that, the recognition result will be displayed in the console

        Parameters:
        testMatrices - an array of MnistMatrix.
        numberOfThreads - that will be used for MnistMatrix recognition.

      • getK

        public int getK()
        Returns:
        k

      • getTrainMatrices

        public MnistMatrix[] getTrainMatrices()
        Returns:
        trainMatrices

      • getMetricType

        public MetricTypes getMetricType()
        Returns:
        metricType

      • setK

        public void setK​(int k)
        set the k property.

        The value of k can affect the recognition error rate.

        Parameters:
        k - description.

      • setTrainMatrices

        public void setTrainMatrices​(MnistMatrix[] trainMatrices)
        Set the trainMatrices property.

        The value of trainMatrices can affect the recognition error rate.

        Parameters:
        trainMatrices - description.

      • setMetricType

        public void setMetricType​(MetricTypes metricType)
        Set the metricType property.

        The type of metricType can't affect the recognition error rate.

        Parameters:
        metricType - description.
